findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions addBlackList() and removeBlackList() use a loop to iterate through addresses list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the list is too long.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract has various privileged roles including Minter, Burn, Risk manager, and Executor with capabilities to mint under capitalization, burn, take snapshot/pause/unpause, add/remove from blacklist, transfer discounted tokens, and withdraw ERC20 tokens.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: Potential Denial of Service (DoS) attack due to block gas limit.
